name: transvestism
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the practice of wearing clothes usually associated with a different gender, especially by a man who sometimes wears the clothes, make-up, jewellery, etc. usually worn by women: He has written a book on transvestism. See
transvestiteNote: This word is offensive to many people. Do not use it unless you are talking about a person who has said that they prefer it.
More examplesFewer examplesThere is evidence that transvestism played an important role in the religion of pre-Christian Scandinavia.They emphasised that transvestism should not be seen as a psychiatric problem.I'll be looking at the history of transvestism, and interviewing various people for their views.
